mapper.select: SELECT q.question_id, q.user_id, q.question_content, q.question_date, u.nickname AS userNickname, COUNT(a.answer_id) AS answerCount FROM questions q JOIN users u ON q.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN answers a ON q.question_id = a.question_id GROUP BY q.question_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questions (user_id, question_content, question_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{questionContent}, #{questionDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE questions SET user_id = #{userId}, question_content = #{questionContent}, question_date = #{questionDate} WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
